channel.title: CVE Feed for Fortinet -- Fortinet FortiWLM
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fortinet -- Fortinet FortiWLM

item.title: CVE-2021-43070|2024-10-22T20:59:56.941Z -- fortinet -- fortinet%20fortiwlm
item.description: Multiple relative path traversal vulnerabilities [CWE-23] in FortiWLM management interface 8.6.2 and below, 8.5.2 and below, 8.4.2 and below, 8.3.3 and below, 8.2.2 may allow an authenticated attacker to retrieve arbitrary files from the underlying filesystem via specially crafted web requests.
